meta_description: Industrial history museum located in the 1846 Robbins & Lawrence Armory, a National Historic Landmark, the American Precision Museum tells the story of the American system of manufacturing. Open year-round.
hours_text:
* Hours & Admission
  * Parking & Directions
  * Group Visits
  * Area Attractions
  * FAQ

## Seasonal Hours

Season | Days | Open | Close  
---|---|---|---  
May 1 – Oct 31 | Monday – Sunday | 10:00 am | 5:00 pm  
Nov 1 – Apr 30 | Monday – Friday | 10:00 am | 4:00 pm  
  
Please confirm special hours during holidays and severe weather.

## Admission

Category | Price | Notes  
---|---|---  
Adults | $10 |   
Seniors (65+) | $8 |   
Youth (ages 6-18) | $5 |   
Children (under 6) | Free |   
Members | Free | [Join and enjoy year‑round benefits](http://web.archive.org/web/20251105020038/https://americanprecision.org/membership/)  
Group Tours (10+) | Call | [Contact us](http://web.archive.org/web/20251105020038/https://americanprecision.org/contact/) for rates & scheduling  
  
## Accessibility

  * Accessible entrance and restrooms.
  * Wheelchair available for visitor use.
  * Some seating located throughout the galleries.
  * Audio-guides available for free.
  * Service animals welcome.

Need an accommodation? Call [(802) 674‑5781](http://web.archive.org/web/20251105020038/tel:+18026745781) or [email us](http://web.archive.org/web/20251105020038/mailto:info@americanprecision.org) in advance of your visit.

## Parking & Directions

### Parking

  * Free on‑site parking adjacent to the museum (enter via Main Street or Maple Street).
  * Accessible parking spaces available near the main entrance.
  * Bus parking for school and tour groups—please call ahead.

## 

As a museum member, your support is essential to the success of the American Precision Museum. Your membership impacts every aspect of what we do, from creating engaging educational programs and developing innovative exhibits to preserving our National Historic Landmark building and caring for our unparalleled machine tool collection. Together, we can inspire the next generation of innovators and keep the legacy of precision manufacturing alive!

JOIN OR RENEW HERE
